page.title: 08Transport in West Farnham
page.content: The main roads in the area are the A31 Farnham By-pass to Alton and the A325 running up Wrecclesham Hill towards Bordon. {Buses}:In West Farnham there is one bus depot on Wrecclesham Hill. The main bus routes are :-The A225 bus which enters our area at Shortheath and goes through Weydon Estate.The 226 bus goes along the A325 from Bordon to Farnham.The 214 runs along the A31 to Alton. {Taxis}:There are 8-9 taxis operating in the West Farnham area. The service charges 85p to start off and then goes up 15p every 25 yards. Each taxi takes about 30-40 people a day. {Railways}: There is no railway station in this block but the Farnham to Alton line goes through it. In 1985 this line will switch to a single line with a passing loop at Bentley.
